Definition: You will be given two sentences. One of them is a paraphrase of the other, with changes in aspect, tense, number, voice, or synonym. Your task is to decide what is the difference between the two sentences.

Positive Examples.input: original sentence: Lily spoke to Donna , breaking her silence . paraphrase: Lily is speaking to Donna , breaking her silence .
Positive Examples.explanation: The verbs in this example are changed from past tense to present tense.

Positive Examples.input: original sentence: I'm sure that my map will show this building ; it is very good . paraphrase: I'm sure that my maps will show these buildings ; they are very good .
Positive Examples.explanation: In this example, map and building and their pronouns has been changed. So, the output should be Number.

Positive Examples.input: original sentence: Jim signaled the barman and gestured toward his bathroom key . paraphrase: Jim dreamily signaled the barman and vaguely gestured toward his bathroom key .
Positive Examples.explanation: In this example the adverbs "vaguely" and "dreamily" are added to the original sentence.

Negative Examples.input: original sentence: The dog chased the cat , which ran up a tree . It waited at the bottom . paraphrase: The dog is chasing the cat , which is running up a tree . It is waiting at the bottom .
Negative Examples.explanation: The change in the original sentence is to tense, as the past tense verbs are changed to present tense ones. "Voice" is not a correct answer here.

Negative Examples.input: original sentence: John was doing research in the library when he heard a man humming and whistling . He was very annoyed . paraphrase: John and Steve were doing research in the library when they heard men humming and whistling . They were very annoyed .
Negative Examples.explanation: You should only output the title of the change, and nothing more.

Instances.input: original sentence: As Andrea in the crop duster passed over Susan , she could see the landing strip . paraphrase: as cornelia in the crop duster passed over aria , she could see the landing strip .
original sentence: Jackson was greatly influenced by Arnold , though he lived two centuries earlier . paraphrase: Arnold greatly influenced Jackson , though he lived two centuries earlier .
original sentence: Anne gave birth to a daughter last month . She is a very charming baby . paraphrase: Bob gave birth to a son last month . He is a very charming baby .
original sentence: Lily spoke to Donna , breaking her concentration . paraphrase: Donna was spoken to by Lily , breaking her concentration .

original sentence: The scientists are studying three species of fish that have recently been found living in the Indian Ocean . They appeared two years ago . paraphrase: Three species of fish that have recently been found living in the Indian Ocean are being studied by scientists . They began two years ago .

original sentence: The police arrested all of the gang members . They were trying to run the drug trade in the neighborhood . paraphrase: The police immediately arrested all of the gang members . They were seriously trying to run the drug trade in the neighborhood .
original sentence: Mary tucked her daughter Anne into bed , so that she could work . paraphrase: John tucked his son Henry into bed , so that he could work .

original sentence: Sam tried to paint a picture of shepherds with sheep , but they ended up looking more like dogs . paraphrase: Sam is trying to paint a picture of shepherds with sheep , but they are ending up looking more like dogs .
